andromeda.why: Refuses charisma-coercion; sovereignty first when the past pattern ‘smells’ off.

arcturus.why: Early viability scan—pattern memory, risk flags, due-diligence before entry.

draco.why: Predator detection—sniffing for exploitative repeats to guard the tribe.

lyra.why: Plain, credible framing makes pattern warnings receivable.

orion-dark.why: Honeyed offers and status optics used to slip control back in.

orion-light.why: Discipline to pause power until the pattern is clean—honorable restraint.

pleiades.why: Considers relational impact so the ‘meeting’ does not harm bonds.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching pattern hygiene; no formal transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Declines forced partnering; chooses meetings that protect sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Places people/resources by pattern fit—triage of alliances for stability.

draco.why: Guard duty—screens for predatory actors at the gate.

lyra.why: Clear narrative of ‘why this alliance’ reduces confusion and spin.

orion-dark.why: Protocol used to smuggle hierarchy under the guise of fit.

orion-light.why: Choose honorable partners; ignore bait that flatters rank.

pleiades.why: Attunes to the felt safety of the group during new meetings.

sirius.why: Practical alliance placement; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after seduction/manipulation patterns resurface.

arcturus.why: Regulation wobble—false positives/negatives while calibrating the ‘smell’ test.

draco.why: Paranoid gatekeeping or dominance tests framed as ‘protection.’

lyra.why: Brand/optics weaponized to distract from red flags.

orion-dark.why: Narrative control—marketing spell to reinstall the old hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Ordeal of correction: admit misreads, reset stance, refine criteria.

pleiades.why: Appeasement—agreeing to meetings to ‘keep peace’ despite cues.

sirius.why: Self-forging recognition; no law transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates sovereign terms—meetings serve freedom, not capture.

arcturus.why: Translates pattern memory into protocol—checklists, thresholds, no-go rules.

draco.why: Perimeter ethics—intercept predation before it enters the camp.

lyra.why: Plain, dignified messaging helps the tribe adopt the screens.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy risk—protocol becomes dogma over living signals.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-conduct: meet firmly, decline cleanly, protect the oath.

pleiades.why: Humane screening preserves trust and nervous-system ease.

sirius.why: Alliance protocol teaching—law of ‘right meeting’ via example and frame.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that sanctifies shady deals as ‘for the tribe.’

arcturus.why: Projected as universal negotiator → burnout/scapegoat when refusing bad alliances.

draco.why: Status contests and loyalty tests around who controls the gate.

lyra.why: Credible, untheatrical presence steadies the field in high-stakes meetings.

orion-dark.why: Marketing/PR as mind-capture to reinstall hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—only endorse alliances that pass the law of fit.

pleiades.why: Enmeshment—saying yes to keep harmony despite pattern alarms.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: ethical gatekeeping under pressure and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from repeating capture cycles—chooses clean meetings.

arcturus.why: Elder standards for alliance memory—reviews, renewals, sunset clauses.

draco.why: Guardian of the gate—filters threats with measured, lawful strength.

lyra.why: Sober, dignified signal becomes the culture’s ‘pattern sense.’

orion-dark.why: Canonizing gate power into hierarchy rather than service.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—meets or refuses with impeccable timing and courage.

sirius.why: Pattern-law sage—teaches the law of right meeting by embodied example.
